    Comparing epidemic scenarios

Function reference

All functions

comparison()
Create a comparison object
is_comparison()
Check whether an object is a comparison
is_scenario()
Check whether an object is a scenario
make_parameters_SIR_epidemic()
Make useful default arguments to epidemics::sir_desolve()
make_parameters_finalsize_UK()
Make useful default arguments to finalsize::final_size()
run_scenario()
Run a scenario
run_scenario(<comparison>)
Run scenarios contained in a comparison
run_scenario(<scenario>)
Run a scenario
sce_add_info()
Add extra information to a scenario
sce_aggregate_outcomes()
Aggregate scenario outcomes across replicates
sce_are_comparable()
Check whether a pair of scenarios is comparable
sce_drop_data()
Drop outcome data from a scenario or comparison object
sce_drop_data(<comparison>)
Drop outcome data from a comparison object
sce_drop_data(<scenario>)
Drop outcome data from a scenario object
sce_filter_comparable()
Filter for comparable scenarios
sce_from_json()
Read scenario from JSON
sce_get_baseline()
Get the name of the baseline scenario
sce_get_information()
Get scenario information
sce_get_outcomes()
Get scenario outcomes
sce_get_outcomes(<comparison>)
Get scenario outcomes from a comparison object
sce_get_outcomes(<scenario>)
Get scenario outcomes from a scenario object
sce_get_scenario_names()
Get scenario names from a comparison object
sce_has_data()
Check for scenario data
sce_has_data(<comparison>)
Check for scenario data
sce_has_data(<scenario>)
Check for scenario data
sce_peek_outcomes()
Get scenario outcome names
sce_set_baseline()
Change the baseline scenario in a comparison
sce_set_scenario_names()
Set scenario names in a comparison object.
sce_to_json()
Write scenario to JSON
scenario()
Create a scenario object
validate_comparison()
Validator for the comparison class
validate_scenario()
Validator for the scenario class
